notes.text:
the following issue was fixed by this update: 
Non-RFC6125-compliant host name matching was incorrect (CVE-2013-7440 bnc#930189)

full_product_name.name: python-setuptools-1.1.7-7.1.noarch as component of SUSE Enterprise Storage 1.0

notes.text: The ssl.match_hostname function in CPython (aka Python) before 2.7.9 and 3.x before 3.3.3 does not properly handle wildcards in hostnames, which might allow man-in-the-middle attackers to spoof servers via a crafted certificate.
notes.title: CVE description
